name: Car Sniper Shooting & Racing
description:
Car Sniper Shooting is a combination of Car Racing/Chasing and First Person

Shooter. Load up your guns, hit the road, race against opponents and

destroy them with your guns.

If you are sick of all those boring, repetitive farming games? Then blow some

Car up in this fully 3D action Racing and Shooting Game!

> UNIQUE GAMEPLAY
> STUNNING HIGH-QUALITY GRAPHICS
> ADVANCED PHYSICS ENGINE
> UNLOCK TONS OF POWERFUL GUNS
> SUPER SMOOTH AND SIMPLE CONTROLS
> WISELY FINANCE YOUR UPGRADE ON WEAPONS AND ARMOUR.
